recap_documents.description: OPINION AND ORDER re: 131 MOTION to Dismiss the Amended Complaint (ECF No. 120). filed by Nomis Bay Ltd., Anson Management GP LLC, Anson Advisors Inc., EOM Management LTD, Murchinson Ltd., Anson Funds Management LP, BPY Limited, 129 MOTION to Dismiss the First Amended Complaint. filed by Boothbay Diversified Alpha Master Fund, LP, Boothbay Fund Management, LLC, Boothbay Absolute Return Strategies LP, 83 MOTION to Dismiss Complaint Pursuant to FRCP 12(b)(6). filed by Boothbay Diversified Alpha Master Fund, LP, Boothbay Fund Management, LLC, Boothbay Absolute Return Strategies LP, 88 MOTION to Dismiss . filed by Nomis Bay Ltd., Anson Management GP LLC, Anson Advisors Inc., EOM Management LTD, Murchinson Ltd., Anson Funds Management LP, BPY Limited, 47 MOTION for Preliminary Injunction . filed by Nano Dimension Ltd. For the foregoing reasons, Defendants' motions to dismiss the Amended Complaint are GRANTED in part and DENIED in part; Defendants' motions to dismiss the Complaint are DENIED as moot; and Plaintiff's preliminary injunction motion is DENIED as moot. Accordingly, Plaintiff's federal claims are dismissed with prejudice and state claims are dismissed without prejudice. The Clerk of Court is respectfully directed to CLOSE the case. (Signed by Judge Jennifer L. Rochon on 7/10/2023) (ate) (Entered: 07/10/2023)
